# PostgreSQL Skills

Skills for PostgreSQL database development and optimization.

## Available Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `postgres:optimize-query` | Analyze and optimize slow queries |
| `postgres:schema-review` | Review schema design |
| `postgres:health-check` | Database health and performance check |

## Usage

```bash
# Optimize a query
doyaken skill postgres:optimize-query --query="SELECT..."

# Review schema
doyaken skill postgres:schema-review

# Health check
doyaken skill postgres:health-check
```
